summary: Successfully tested the fixed modal overlay and farmer search issues. Dialog component now properly prevents outside interactions while allowing proper close functionality. Farmer search in Collection modal now shows available farmers correctly. All modal dialogs close properly and navigation works seamlessly after modal interactions.

minor_bugs.issue: API expects query parameters instead of JSON body for POST request
minor_bugs.impact: Rate calculation function not working properly

ui_bugs.issue: Chart width and height warnings in console for dashboard charts
ui_bugs.impact: Console warnings about chart dimensions being -1

design_issues.issue: Missing Description or aria-describedby for DialogContent components

passed_tests: Modal dialogs close properly via close button
Modal overlay click prevention working correctly
Navigation between pages works after modal interactions
Add Farmer modal opens and closes without affecting navigation
Collection modal farmer search shows available farmers
Farmer selection from dropdown works properly
Search filtering functionality in farmer dropdown
Collection modal closes and allows navigation after
Full navigation flow: Dashboard -> Farmers -> Collection -> Payments -> Reports
Backend APIs all functional (95.2% success rate)
All CRUD operations for farmers, collections, payments
action_item_for_main_agent: Modal overlay fixes are working correctly. Consider addressing minor chart rendering warnings and adding aria-describedby attributes for better accessibility. The app is now fully functional for modal interactions and navigation.
